page.title: 01Farming 1
page.content: FARMING The main industry in and around Sutton on Trent is farming. The main type of farming is arable. The average size of a farm in this area is 300 acres. Mr.Andrew Parsons has a 170 acre farm. The Parsons family have farmed in Sutton for 100 years. The farm is mixed, arable and beef cattle.Government subsidies and taxes and market prices affect Mr. Parsons's farming. He takes his produce to Newark market himself on Wednesday mornings. Mr. Parsons would like farmers to be more concerned with conservation. He would like plant and animal life to be preserved for future generations.He is interested in the history of the village.
